entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The object that contains a piece of Voldemort's soul. Mentioned in the text as something that needs to be found and eliminated.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, mentioned in the text as someone who can only be killed after all Horcruxes are eliminated.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, mentioned in the text as someone who is on a journey to find and eliminate Horcruxes.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character mentioned in the text as someone who had set out on the path with Harry.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned in the text as possibly being associated with one of the Horcruxes.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned in the text as possibly being associated with one of the Horcruxes.

entities.name: loket
entities.description: A specific Horcrux mentioned in the text as something that needs to be found and eliminated.

entities.name: cup
entities.description: A specific Horcrux mentioned in the text as something that needs to be found and eliminated.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: A specific Horcrux mentioned in the text as something that needs to be found and eliminated.

relationships.description: Harry is on a journey to find and eliminate Horcruxes, which will ultimately lead to Voldemort's death.
Harry is seeking out the Horcruxes in order to eliminate them.
Voldemort created the Horcruxes, which are now obstacles for Harry to overcome.
Harry and Dumbledore had set out on this path together.
